property.name: Rules
property.value: {JOE} 2 Jokers Over Explode 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. Then draw a card.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a non-evolution creature that costs 5 or less, destroy this creature and put that creature into the battle zone. Otherwise, this creature gets +4000 power, "speed attacker" and "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, you may have the first spell you cast cost 1 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {KIZUNA} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use one of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -5000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. {SUPER}When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 2 of their untapped creatures and destroys them.
